cfg.bot_txt:
The notation RX0.1 is alternate position so Serial.swap(). You must choose RX0.1 and TX0.1 or RX0 and TX0 together (exception: TCA).
Signals are often suffixed by the peripheral number so RX1 is UART1 rx. In a few cases n,FN is used (2,OUT.1).
IO ⊓: asynch pin. {srcchip} Diagrams by ObviousInRetrospect.
